ing.item: Green onions with tops; finely chopped

directions.step:
Mix bacon, cheese and onion with sour cream until well blended. Serve with Olive Bread Ring (See recipe). May also be served separately with crackers.
NANCY COUCH LEE
(MRS. JAMES M. JR.)
From <Traditions: A Taste of the Good Life>, by the Little Rock (AR) Junior League. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
